RelatedSentence: BELLOWS FALLS -- Residents adopted a nearly $ 2 million budget at Village Meeting on Monday and are now set to enjoy a 4.11 - cent drop in the tax rate from last year .
BELLOWS FALLS -- Residents adopted a nearly $ 2 million budget at Village Meeting on Monday and are now set to enjoy a 4.11 - cent drop in the tax rate from last year .
About 60 citizens turned out to the Bellows Falls Opera House to have their voices heard on the annual warrant and overwhelmingly adopted the budget proposed by their trustees .
About 60 citizens turned out to the Bellows Falls Opera House to have their voices heard on the annual warrant and overwhelmingly adopted the budget proposed by their trustees .

Voters approved a budget of $ 1,851,602 ( with $ 1,803,252 to be raised taxes ) by a 52-13 margin and later voted 43-15 to authorize the trustees to borrow up to $ 42,000 -- for not more than a three - year term -- to purchase a pick - up truck for the Bellows Falls Fire Department .

Voters approved a budget of $ 1,851,602 ( with $ 1,803,252 to be raised taxes ) by a 52-13 margin and later voted 43-15 to authorize the trustees to borrow up to $ 42,000 -- for not more than a three - year term -- to purchase a pick - up truck for the Bellows Falls Fire Department .
In response to a question posed by resident Doug MacPhee , Municipal Manager Willis D. Chip Stearns II said parking enforcement is not a high priority and , therefore , was not budgeted for .

Most of the evening 's debate pertained to the article granting the trustees the authority to borrow up to $ 42,000 for a new vehicle for the BFFD .
